Dear John:
I have received your inquiry about the Poetry
in Song series, I thought it was a pretty good program;
we used it. It was nothing extraordinary, however, but
it was well enough done for use, I suppose it is good
to continue it; therefore, I vote "yes”.
Cordially yours,
[^AJojz.&0
Waldo Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
